snippet: An armed group fired at a United Nations police patrol monitoring a protest near the airport in Bangui, the capital of the Central African Republic.
abstract: Armed group fires at United Nations police patrol monitoring protest near airport in the Bangui, capital of the Central African Republic, wounding six constables.
lead_paragraph: An armed group fired at a United Nations police patrol monitoring a protest near the airport in Bangui, the capital of the Central African Republic.

headline.main: U.N. Patrol Is Attacked in Central Africa
headline.print_headline: U.N. Patrol Is Attacked in Central Africa
